name: nsave
headline: Trusted $â¬Â£ accounts abroad for people from unstable economies.
description: nsave is a fintech that provides trusted $â¬Â£ accounts abroad for people from countries where inflation is high and banking is broken.

founders.name: Amer Baroudi, Founder
founders.description:
Syrian-born entrepreneur and Rhodes Scholar, Amer holds two degrees from the University of Oxford and is a governance, policy, and finance expert. He co-founded award-winning international companies, built properties in Europe, served as the founding president of the Oxford Syria Society, and advised clients ranging from government authorities to a Premier League FC. He is a tireless optimist, an expert problem solver, and, secretly, a music composer.

Amer is co-founder & CEO at nsave.

founders.name: Abdallah AbuHashem, Founder
founders.description: Abdallah is the Co-founder of Masref. He is a Rhodes Scholar from Gaza, Palestine and a Stanford alum having worked at a number of Silicon Valley companies and startups. In his free time, Abdallah plays chess (yes because of the Queen's Gambit), reads books, and repeats watching the same 3 TV shows.

This website is owned and operated by Masref Ltd., incorporated in the United Kingdom The information provided is not legally binding and does not constitute an offering, endorsement, recommendation or solicitation to enter into any type of financial transaction in this or in any other jurisdiction in which such solicitation or offer would be unlawful under the laws of such jurisdiction. The GBP and EUR card accounts are issued by AF Payments Limited pursuant to a license by Mastercard International. AF Payments Limited is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900440) for the issuing of electronic money and payment instruments. Mastercard and the Mastercard brand mark are registered trademarks of Mastercard International. As a registered EMI, AF Payments holds your funds in a safeguarding account which offers protection if AF Payments goes out of business. It is important to know that as a non-bank payment provider, your money is not protected by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS). For more information on Safeguarding, please feel free to consult the FCA website: https://www.fca.org.uk/consumers/using-payment-service-providers. GBP and Multi-Currency accounts are offered by Frost Money Ltd. authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 936270) for the issuing of electronic money and payment instruments.* Coming soon
## USD, GBP, EUR.
A secure, multi-currency, non-interest bearing account that allows you to hold, and exchange USD, EUR, and GBP. Effortlessly transfer funds to others, and receive payments directly into your account — all in one place.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e2937e296ba9e1b18af8c8/67805f4dece5dfda144b3201_cash-modal.png)
GBP and EUR accounts are issued by AF Payments Limited pursuant to a license by Mastercard International. AF Payments Limited is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900440) for the issuing of electronic money and payment instruments. As a registered EMI, AF Payments holds your funds in a safeguarding account which offers protection if AF Payments goes out of business. It is important to know that as a non-bank payment provider, your money is not protected by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS). GBP and Multi-Currency accounts are offered by Frost Money Ltd. authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 936270) for the issuing of electronic money and payment instruments. The Swiss USD accounts are provided by nsave SA a Swiss financial intermediary affiliated to the self-regulatory organisation “Organisme de Surveillance pour Intermédiaires Financiers & Trustees” (SO-FIT). Copyright © 2025 nsave Inc. All rights reserved.
## US stocks & ETFs.
An investment feature providing access to a wide range of U.S. stocks, ETFs, bonds, money market funds*, and more – including silver and gold. Designed to help you grow your wealth and achieve your financial goals.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e2937e296ba9e1b18af8c8/677cefd64f89b5f0b27c34c5_invest-modal.png)
Investments involve risks, including the potential total loss of capital. Past performance is not indicative of future results. Each investor is responsible for making their own decisions and should seek advice from a licensed financial advisor or qualified professional if uncertain. Investment and all brokerage & securities services are provided by Alpaca Securities LLC. Alpaca is a FINRA and SEC member. All funds are held by Alpaca. nsave SA, with registered seat at Route de la Galaise 34, 1228 Plan-les-Ouates, Switzerland, is a Swiss financial intermediary affiliated to the self-regulatory organisation “Organisme de Surveillance pour Intermédiaires Financiers & Trustees” (SO-FIT). nsave SA accepts public deposits operating in the framework of the sandbox defined in the Swiss Banking Ordinance. nsave SA does not provide interest bearing accounts and is not supervised by the Swiss financial market supervisory authority FINMA. nsave SA is not a “bank” nor a “person” pursuant to Article 1a or 1b of the Swiss Banking Act and does not benefit from any deposit insurance scheme. nsave SA does not provide any brokerage & securities services. Consult the information sheet here for more details on financial services provided by nsave SA. Copyright © 2025 nsave Inc. All rights reserved.
## Local cash payouts.
Send money to friends and family worldwide with our fast and secure cash payout and pick-up service. Choose from thousands of trusted locations for cash pick-up, making it easy for your recipients to access funds in minutes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e2937e296ba9e1b18af8c8/67606746d3bf43f2caf3923f_cash-payouts-modal.webp)
Local payouts works with GBP and Multi-Currency accounts which are offered by Frost Money Ltd. authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 936270) for the issuing of electronic money and payment instruments. It is important to know that as a non-bank payment provider, your money is not protected by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS). Copyright © 2025 nsave Inc. All rights reserved.
## Mastercard.
A Mastercard that is linked to your account for seamless global spending and withdrawals. Manage your virtual and physical card, freeze and lock it if needed – all in the nsave app.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e2937e296ba9e1b18af8c8/677cefa0541ac19ab148990e_mastercards-modal.png)
The GBP and EUR card accounts are issued by AF Payments Limited pursuant to a license by Mastercard International. AF Payments Limited is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900440) for the issuing of electronic money and payment instruments. Mastercard and the Mastercard brand mark are registered trademarks of Mastercard International. As a registered EMI, AF Payments holds your funds in a safeguarding account which offers protection if AF Payments goes out of business. It is important to know that as a non-bank payment provider, your money is not protected by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS). Copyright © 2025 nsave Inc. All rights reserved.
## Up to 5% returns.
Coming soon
Premier investments with BlackRock, the world's largest asset manager. Invest in Money Market Funds composed of the highest-rated government treasury bonds, offering up to 5% returns, while prioritising safety and liquidity.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e2937e296ba9e1b18af8c8/677cf039f6c89f85e9e70337_interest-modal.png)
These services will be provided after obtaining the relevant regulatory authorisation and partnerships. Copyright © 2025 nsave. All rights reserved.
## Wealth management.
Coming soon
Expertly designed for your goals. Lower risks, and higher returns. Effortless wealth building: Smart investing, personalised for you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e2937e296ba9e1b18af8c8/677cf003a2c2e79852474f7c_wealth-modal.png)
These services will be provided after obtaining the relevant regulatory authorisation and partnerships. Copyright © 2025 nsave. All rights reserved.

generated_description:
### nsave: Global Accounts for Unstable Economies

**Overview**  
Founded in 2022 and based in London, nsave is a promising fintech startup part of Y Combinator's Batch S22. At its core, the company aims to provide trusted multi-currency accounts (USD, GBP, EUR) for individuals from countries facing high inflation and unreliable banking systems. 

**Mission**  
nsave's mission is straightforward: to empower people from unstable economies by giving them access to robust financial tools that can protect and grow their wealth. They see themselves as a lifeline for those who need a safe place for their money as traditional banking systems falter.

**Services Offered**  
nsave offers an array of services designed for young professionals who need flexible, global financial solutions, including:
- **Multi-Currency Accounts**: Secure, non-interest-bearing accounts that allow users to hold, exchange, and transfer USD, GBP, and EUR easily.
- **Investments**: Access to U.S. stocks, ETFs, and a range of investment opportunities tailored to grow user wealth.
- **Local Cash Payouts**: A quick and secure service to send money that can be picked up in cash from trusted locations worldwide.
- **Mastercard Access**: A debit card linked to the account for seamless global spending.
- **Future Offerings**: Plans to introduce wealth management services and investment products promising returns of up to 5% in collaboration with major asset managers.

**Pricing Model**  
nsave keeps its pricing simple: a small monthly fee of $2.99, minimizing costs on transactions while maximizing service accessibility.

**Team and Leadership**  
The team consists of 15 dedicated members, led by advisors including Tom Blomfield, a recognizable figure in the fintech space. This leadership experience offers nsave a strong foundation in navigating the complexities of global finance.

**Bottom Line**  
In a world where financial security remains a luxury for many, nsave emerges as a beacon of hope. Its innovative approach to banking for underserved markets taps into a critical need and positions itself uniquely in the fintech landscape. They’re not just offering accounts; they’re changing lives, one currency at a time.

For more information, check out their website at [nsave.com](https://www.nsave.com).
